announcements.details: Read the commentary on the readings for the 30th Sunday in Ordinary Time
announcements.title: Commentary: The Commemoration of All the Faithful Departed

announcements.details: There will be TWO masses on Sunday, 2nd November, 2025. Offertory will be led by the Sacred Heart of Jesus Confraternity and the Wednesday borns respectively. Prayer of the faithful will be led by the Lectors.
announcements.title: Mass Schedule: The Commemoration of All the Faithful Departed

announcements.details: Saturday, 1st November is the Solemnity of All Saints. Rosary prayers will be in the morning at 6:00am followed by Mass at 6:30am
announcements.title: Solemnity of All Saints

announcements.details: World Youth Day, Accra, is scheduled for 21st and 22nd November to take place at Kordiabe. All youth are encouraged to register at the finance desk or with either of the church secretaries.
announcements.title: World Youth Day, Accra

announcements.details: Parents and guardians with wards in boarding and tertiary schools are encouraged to submit their details to members of the Formation Team or the Youth Council.
announcements.title: School Visitation Project

announcements.details: In an effort to foster stronger fellowship among the youth, the Parish Youth Council will be reaching out to members in the Youth WhatsApp group via phone calls in the following days. We encourage everyone to respond positively and help in building a united St. Bakhita community.
announcements.title: Bakhita Youth WhatsApp Outreach

events.subtitle: All youth are encouraged to attend this year's event.
events.title: World Youth Day, Accra

schedules.liturgicalWeek: 30th Week in Ordinary Time, 27th Oct - 1st Nov

masses.subtitle: First mass at 7:00am, Second mass at 9:30am
masses.title: The Commemoration of All the Faithful Departed

masses.details: Rosary prayers begin 30 mins before mass
masses.subtitle: Monday - Friday at 7pm.

masses.details: Rosary prayers begin 30 mins before mass

sacraments.details: Kindly contact the church office to register for Infant Baptism
sacraments.subtitle: First Saturday of every month, after Grotto Mass

sacraments.subtitle: The St Bakhita Marriage School will commence on the 19th of October, 2025.
sacraments.title: Marriage School

sacraments.subtitle: Adults: Sunday after first mass; Children: Saturdays at 3pm
